DOC.brief_summary: Hepatitis B Vaccine [ Recombinant ] well-established vaccine use extensively , worldwide since initial licensure 1986 . Hepatitis B vaccine : [ 1 ] induce protection morbidity mortality acute hepatitis B virus infection , [ 2 ] reduce incidence chronic infection vaccinate population , [ 3 ] thereby , reduce incidence hepatocellular carcinoma . The purpose trial assess new manufacturing process Hepatitis B Vaccine [ Recombinant ] vaccine show level hepatitis B antibody response well currently license Hepatitis B Vaccine [ Recombinant ] vaccine . This study also confirm new process vaccine well tolerated current vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine Healthy Neonates ( V232-056 )
